Question: This prevented this person from openly condemning Joseph McCarthy's highly criticized methods against communism.
Hints: This person's campaign was noted for the simple but effective slogan, "I Like Ike".
Most Arab countries were skeptical about the "this person doctrine" because they considered "Zionist imperialism" the real danger.
This person gained his fourth star and gave up command of ETOUSA to be commander of NATOUSA.
